description.en:
A collection of short stories centered on a mysterious antique shop and the strange items you can buy.

1. Tails Emotion
Akihiko always seems to get wrong signals from his grilfriend, Shizune. Then he buys a pair of glasses from this odd antique shop--and now people look like dogs!

2. Return to Blue
Hayasaka-kun loves his teacher, Kyouko-sensei. At an odd antique shop he buys a book as a present for her. As Kyouko-sensei reads the book, it has a strange effect on her...

3-4. Countdown-Lag
Frail Mizuki died two years ago, leaving her younger sister, Miki--and a boyfriend, Yuusuke-chan. Miki loves Yuusuke as well. But Mizuki left Miki a strange pocket-watch. Can it help?

5-6, 9. Dream Channel
Minoru made pretty Maho a promise: no sex until they were adults. But now Maho has a cellphone she bought from an odd antique shop--and she refuses to let her beloved Minoru see it!

7. Roomless Love
Eri and her step-brother love each other very much--but can only kiss during stolen moments together. Then a mysterious shop-keeper gives them a set of hour-glasses. How can they help?

8. Pinks Links - After Links
Touya seduced his older sister, but now he avoids her. It's already been a week--has Touya stopped loving her? Or could there be another problem...?

**TAGS**
**MALE** glasses, schoolboy uniform, shared senses, sweating
**FEMALE** age progression, age regression, ahegao, big ass, bunny girl, business suit, defloration, dog girl, garter belt, glasses, kissing, leotard, lingerie, nakadashi, pantyhose, ponytail, schoolgirl uniform, shared senses, sister, stockings, sweating, teacher, x-ray
**MIXED** incest, inseki
**OTHER** multi-work series, tankoubon, time stop
